column1: '''King of Nargothrond''' was a title begun by [[Finrod|Finrod Felagund]]
column2: who founded the citadel and realm of [[Nargothrond]] in [[West Beleriand]].  After his loss
column3: the Kingship passed to his nephew [[Orodreth]]
column4: who held that title until he perished in the [[Sack of Nargothrond]].
